definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
to assist one's husband and educate the children (idiom)/the traditional roles of a good wife
to kill a pig as a lesson to the children (idiom); parents must teach by example
to write on the sand with reeds while teaching one's son (idiom)/mother's admirable dedication to her children's education

sentences.english: For a moment he reflected on how much he loved this godson.
sentences.chinese: 一会儿，他仔细想他多么爱这个教子。

sentences.english: Even today, god parents will often give shoes to their godchild on this occasion.
sentences.chinese: 即使是今天，教父教母给教子的礼物仍常常是鞋。

sentences.english: The piece has an unfortunate headline: "Why Chinese Mothers Are Superior."
sentences.chinese: 为什么中国的母亲更教子有方？

sentences.english: And don't give me any of that nonsense about a woman's place being in the home .
sentences.chinese: 别跟我说那些“女人应该在家相夫教子”的废话。

sentences.english: Could you give me some advice on how to bring up my son properly?
sentences.chinese: 您能给我些建议如何才能教子有方呢？

sentences.english: You've been a fine godson , you've given me all the respect.
sentences.chinese: 你一直是一个好教子，你给了我所有的尊重。

sentences.english: And you, godson , you now, you just don't have talent enough.
sentences.chinese: 那么你，教子，你现在，你就没有足够的天分。

sentences.english: Mencius once played truant, and she cut the cloth she was weaving to show her seriousness.
sentences.chinese: 一次孟子逃学，孟母就割断织机的布来教子。

sentences.english: Mothers are each other's nemeses, bickering among ourselves about our own particular style.
sentences.chinese: 母亲们互不相让，针对自己独特的教子风格争论不休。

sentences.english: He patted his godson on the shoulder.
sentences.chinese: 他在肩膀上轻拍着他的教子。

sentences.english: It was an excerpt of her parenting book, the “Battle Hymn of the Tiger Mother.”
sentences.chinese: 这篇文章摘自她的教子经《虎妈战歌》。

sentences.english: He really wants to fulfil his role as godson properly.
sentences.chinese: 他确实想好好履行作为教子的职责。

sentences.english: Now, she is living a low-keyed life at home supporting her husband and daughters.
sentences.chinese: 甚至是现在低调的相夫教子的生活，都让人称羡不已。

sentences.english: The traditional destiny of photograph husband godchild cannot chain this woman flourishingly life.
sentences.chinese: 相夫教子的传统命运无法锁住这女子蓬勃的生命。

definition: to teach by words and example (idiom)
filial piety (Confucian virtue)/to be a good son or daughter
(classical) this, that/he, she, they/(exclamatory final particle)/(initial particle, introduces an opinion)
a sage/wise and holy man/virtuous ruler/Buddhist lama/wine
to assist one's husband and educate the children (idiom)/the traditional roles of a good wife
the way of one's conduct and interaction in society (idiom)
benevolent father, filial son (idiom)/natural love between parents and children
